Show a checkbox in the grid header to ch: Show a checkbox in the grid header to check or uncheck multiple items.
Attribute is required if the column can: Attribute is required if the column can be sorted or filtered
Caption: Caption
Set the reference to enable filtering ov: Set the reference to enable filtering over association with the Drop-down filter widget.
The options to show in the Drop-down fil: The options to show in the Drop-down filter widget.
Lazy loading enables faster data grid lo: Lazy loading enables faster data grid loading, but with personalization enabled, value restoration will be limited.
If set to yes, then all default events o: If set to yes, then all default events on the row, such as "on click" or selection, will be triggered when the user interacts with custom content.
Enable sorting for all columns unless sp: Enable sorting for all columns unless specified otherwise in the column setting
Enable resizing for all columns unless s: Enable resizing for all columns unless specified otherwise in the column setting
Enable reordering for all columns unless: Enable reordering for all columns unless specified otherwise in the column setting
Enable hiding for all columns unless spe: Enable hiding for all columns unless specified otherwise in the column setting
When Browser local storage is selected,: When Browser local storage is selected, the configuration is scoped to a browser profile. This configuration is not tied to a Mendix user.
Attribute containing the personalized co: Attribute containing the personalized configuration of the capabilities. This configuration is automatically stored and loaded. The attribute requires Unlimited String.
The list of attributes is used by the fi: The list of attributes is used by the filter widgets that are placed in the placeholder above the data grid. This enables filtering across multiple attributes or columns instead of limiting to a single column.
Assistive technology will read this upon: Assistive technology will read this upon reaching a filtering or sorting section.
Assistive technology will read this upon reaching a export dialog.
Assistive technology will read this upon reaching a cancel button.
If selection is enabled, assistive techn: If selection is enabled, assistive technology will read this upon reaching a checkbox.
